text: 9|114|ibrahim addehattinre pitavin venti papameacanam tetiyat addeham pitavineat annane vagdanam ceytat keant matramayirunnu. ennal ayal (pitavâ€Œ) allahuvinre satruvanenn addehattin vyaktamayappeal addeham ayale (pitavine) vittealinnu. tirccayayum ibrahim ere talmayullavanum sahanasilanumakunnu
